description:
Not all puddles can be dodged. Pairing a classic silhouette with clever waterproof breathable technology, the Weekend Sneakers are a step away from the standard. Vessi’s sock-knit construction comfortably wraps around your foot and seals out the elements.

  • Dyma-tex® waterproof construction keeps your feet dry
  • Sock-knit construction hugs your feet and breathes well
  • Machine washable, so you can keep your sneakers looking their best
  • Lugged outsole offers great grip on a variety of surfaces
  • Vessi notes that the Weekend Sneakers run large, so if you are half size, order down the next full size
name: Vessi Weekend Sneaker Waterproof Shoes - Men's
